meanings.definition: A book with blank pages for sticking in cuttings, pictures, or other mementos.
meanings.sent1: My grandma keeps all her memories in scrapbooks.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy looking through old scrapbooks to see how life was back then.
meanings.sent3: The scrapbook of my childhood is a treasure trove of silly drawings and memories.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a scrapbook of past adventures, each page filled with vivid recollections.
meanings.sent5: The scrapbook overflowed with colorful moments, each one a snapshot of joy.

meanings.definition: A collection of photographs, newspaper clippings, and other items pasted or arranged in a book.
meanings.sent1: The family scrapbook held cherished memories of holidays and gatherings.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours organizing her scrapbook of travel souvenirs.
meanings.sent3: The scrapbook of funny cat pictures never failed to make me smile.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a scrapbook of lost loves, each memory carefully preserved.
meanings.sent5: The scrapbook told the story of a life well-lived, page by page.
